about_the_game:
Allows you to use Tifa Lockhart and equip her with the following items.
- Avalanche Garb I (Appearance)
- Avalanche Garb II (Appearance)
- Avalanche Garb III (Appearance)
- Leather Gloves (Weapon)
- Metal Knuckles (Weapon)
- Mythril Claws (Weapon)
- Special Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.
detailed_description:
Allows you to use Tifa Lockhart and equip her with the following items.
- Avalanche Garb I (Appearance)
- Avalanche Garb II (Appearance)
- Avalanche Garb III (Appearance)
- Leather Gloves (Weapon)
- Metal Knuckles (Weapon)
- Mythril Claws (Weapon)
- Special Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
